articles.title: Video: Artemis I voyage will put new astronaut technology to the test - CNN Video
articles.description: The Artemis I mission will test the AstroRad vest, a joint Israeli-NASA technology designed to better shield astronauts - especially females - from radiation so they can stay in space longer. CNN's Hadas Gold tries out the vest.

articles.author: Nouran Salahieh
articles.title: Still reeling from the last flooding event, Mississippi residents are once again fleeing rising river waters threatening to creep into their homes
articles.description: As record-setting rain and rising river waters threaten to seep into their homes, residents in Jackson, Mississippi, are once again packing up their belongings and hoping for the best.
articles.content:

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Launch day arrives for NASA's Artemis I mission that will journey around the moon
articles.description: Launch day has finally arrived for the uncrewed Artemis I mission, which is scheduled to lift off on a journey around the moon from Kennedy Space Center between 8:33 a.m. and 10:33 a.m. ET.
articles.content: Turn to CNN for live coverage from Kennedy Space Center in Florida through the Monday morning launch. Space correspondents Kristin Fisher and Rachel Crane will bring us moment by moment reporting fro… [+4057 chars]

articles.title: Washington Commanders running back Brian Robinson Jr. was shot in possible attempted robbery or carjacking, police say
articles.description: Washington Commanders rookie running back Brian Robinson, Jr. was shot Sunday in Washington, DC, in what authorities believe may have been an attempted robbery or carjacking, police said.

articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Artemis I's trip around the moon will pave a path to Mars
articles.description: Before landing the first humans on Mars, NASA wants to return to the lunar surface and establish a sustained human presence on the moon. The lessons learned from the beginning of the Artemis program could impact when and how humans explore Mars.

articles.title: What the words you'll hear during the moon mission launch really mean
articles.description: Don't let the jargon used by NASA mission teams throw you off if you're tuning in to the Artemis I launch Monday. Here are some of the words and phrases you can expect to hear before, during and after liftoff.

articles.author: Analysis by Clare Sebastian, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: 'Slower burn.' Russia dodges economic collapse but the decline has started
articles.description: Six months after invading Ukraine, Russia is bogged down in a war of attrition it didn't anticipate but it is having success on another front — its oil-dependent economy is in a deep recession but proving far more resilient than expected.

articles.author: Opinion by Marco Rubio
articles.title: Sen. Rubio: Why the Artemis I launch is so important
articles.description: Sen. Marco Rubio writes that Monday's scheduled launch of Artemis I to the moon is a cause for patriotism and pride. He says America's journeys through the stars are a great chapter in the story of our nation.
articles.content:
